mapper.insert: INSERT INTO book (isbn,title,catalogue, nation, publish_date ,publisher, author,price,currency, description) VALUES (#{isbn}, #{title}, #{catalogue}, #{nation}, #{publishDate}, #{publisher}, #{author}, #{price}, #{currency}, #{description})
mapper.select: SELECT isbn,title,catalogue, nation, publish_date ,publisher, author,price,currency, description FROM book
SELECT isbn,title,catalogue, nation, publish_date ,publisher, author,price,currency, description FROM book WHERE title LIKE '%${value}%'
SELECT isbn,title,catalogue, nation, publish_date ,publisher, author,price,currency, description FROM book WHERE publisher LIKE '%${value}%'
SELECT isbn,title,catalogue, nation, publish_date ,publisher, author,price,currency, description FROM book WHERE price <#{value}
SELECT isbn,title,catalogue, nation, publish_date ,publisher, author,price,currency, description FROM book WHERE isbn = #{value}
SELECT isbn,title,catalogue, nation, publish_date ,publisher, author,price,currency, description FROM book WHERE title = #{value}
